title: What Amazon Microsoft and Google are doing right
text:
What Amazon, Microsoft and Google are doing right 
CNBC Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Microsoft gets a lift from cloud 
CNBC's Jon Fortt breaks down Microsoft's quarterly report, in which the company delivered earnings and revenue that topped analysts' expectations.
